items.title: We’ll see
items.description: Today’s letter is titled “We’ll see!” “We’ll see” is the refrain in the Charlie Wilson’s War version of the 2000-year-old Chinese parable about the old man who lost his horse. items.title: Disintegration
items.description: This poem was inspired by listening to The Cure’s Disintegration at top volume in my studio. I put it at the top of last Friday’s newsletter, “A New Appreciation.”
